channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 12:34 Close the threat of artobrats in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community. Salt for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 12:34 Close the threat of artobrats in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community. Salt for further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 12:27 Close the threat of Artobstil to the Chervonohrigor Territorial Community. Take care of further reports.
item.description: 🟢 12:27 Close the threat of Artobstil to the Chervonohrigor Territorial Community. Take care of further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 12:26 Flashing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Pokrovsk Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivka Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 12:26 Flashing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Pokrovsk Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivka Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
